pages.text: $(li)Cachalot Whales are neutral, massive mammals creatures found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/lukewarm_ocean)Lukewarm Oceans$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/cold_ocean)Cold Oceans$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/deep_ocean)Deep Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)They detect their preys, $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l) sending out a moaning noise to echolocate them.

$(li)During thunderstoms, Cachalot Whales may spawn washed up on $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/beach)Beaches$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you pushed back into the water without hurt them, they may reward you with an $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/ambergris)Ambergris$(/l).
